bibl.title: Pottery Manufacture in Roman Egypt. A New Papyrus.
bibl.note: Pottery lease. 5 September, A.D. 243. Will appear in a forthcoming volume of "The Oxyrhynchus Papyri" with two other leases closely related in subject-matter, terminology, date and the names of the contracting parties (22 September, A.D. 260 and some time before A.D. 269). [= P. Oxy. L, 3595].
bibl.seg: Cockle Helen M., Pottery Manufacture in Roman Egypt. A New Papyrus.

Pottery lease. 5 September, A.D. 243. Will appear in a forthcoming volume of "The Oxyrhynchus Papyri" with two other leases closely related in subject-matter, terminology, date and the names of the contracting parties (22 September, A.D. 260 and some time before A.D. 269). [= P. Oxy. L, 3595].
